about_the_game:
Mole Mine Rocks 0.15 is a super fun clicker game mixing the addictive stuff of a standard clicker with cool features and upgrades. You run a mole mining operation, mining rocks and minerals to unlock upgrades and new levels.

The game has addictive clicker gameplay where you click to mine rocks and get resources. The more you click, the more you mine! Explore normal and space levels with different challenges and rewards. Upgrade your clicking power to mine more rocks. Hire moles for passive income.

Talk to the game through dynamic dialogue guiding you on your mining journey, and enjoy cutscenes adding to the story. Mine minerals to buy items and upgrades, managing resources to be more efficient.

Watch out for leaks in your mine making you lose minerals over time. Fix leaks to stop losing minerals but be ready to spend minerals to do so. Invest in upgrades to improve mining and handle leaks and other problems.

In Mole Mine Rocks 0.15, planning and managing resources are key to becoming the top mining tycoon. Can you make the best mining operation and beat all the levels? Start mining and find out!

name: mole mine rocks 0.15

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows
  • Processor: Intel Atom N550
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: hd graphics 400
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: Mole Mine Rocks is a clicker game where you manage a mole mining operation. Mine rocks, gather resources, upgrade your abilities, and explore levels. Hire moles for passive income, fix leaks, and interact with dynamic dialogue. Enjoy cutscenes and strategic planning to become a mine manager.
